body_html:
Oh, i see what you've done: if you give 4D Tensor and 2D padding tuple, that's fine. if you give 4D Tensor (NCHW) and 3D padding tuple, then it pads CHW, and if you give 4D Tensor and 4D padding tuple, then it pads all 4 dims.

This seems reasonable, as long as it's well documented. The documentation for F.pad has to be improved do doc this, and we should be good to go.

This seems reasonable, as long as it's well documented. The documentation for F.pad has to be improved do doc this, and we should be good to go.
body:
Oh, i see what you've done: if you give 4D Tensor and 2D padding tuple, that's fine. if you give 4D Tensor (NCHW) and 3D padding tuple, then it pads CHW, and if you give 4D Tensor and 4D padding tuple, then it pads all 4 dims.

This seems reasonable, as long as it's well documented. The documentation for F.pad has to be improved do doc this, and we should be good to go.
